casebody.data:
No. 2083,

Misc.

Buie v. United States. Solicitor General Griswold for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket and set for oral argument immediately following No. 1473 [Minor v. United States, ante, p. 932],
